name: Za'atar Roasted Potatoes
author: Kim's Cooking Now
summary: Za'atar is a Middle Eastern spice mixture, generally consisting of ground dried thyme, toasted sesame seeds, sumac and salt. It tastes great on roasted potatoes!
ingredients: 1 ½ pounds Yukon Gold potatoes, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
directions: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper
Combine potatoes and olive oil in a large bowl and mix well
Sprinkle potatoes with za'atar, salt, and pepper; toss to coat
Transfer potatoes to the prepared baking sheet
Set baking sheet on the lowest rack of a cold oven and heat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Roast until potatoes are golden brown and tender, 30 to 35 minutes, stirring halfway through
